BigNews: <CN>据华尔街日报:币安创始人赵长鹏受到德国监管机构的审查</CN><EN>According to the Wall Street Journal:Binance Founder Zhao Changpeng under scrutiny by German regulators</EN>
<CN>微软风险投资部门据悉一直在打折出售投资组合</CN><EN>Microsoft's Venture Capital arm is known to have been selling portfolios at a discount</EN>

<CN>日本央行宣布提高YCC政策灵活性，将基准利率维持在历史低点-0.1%，允许10年期国债收益率略高于0.5%，但不得高于1.0%</CN><EN>The Bank of Japan announced that it will increase the flexibility of YCC policy, maintain the benchmark interest rate at a historical low of -0.1%, and allow the 10-year government bond yield to be slightly higher than 0.5%, but not higher than 1.0%</EN>
<CN>俄罗斯海军和中国海军舰艇编队开始在太平洋海域进行第三次联合海上巡逻</CN><EN>Russian Navy and Chinese Navy ship formation begins third joint maritime patrol in Pacific ocean</EN>

<CN>一韩国研究团队于7月22日发表论文，宣布首次成功合成常压室温超导体LK-99，全球科研团队正在跟进分析</CN><EN>A South Korean research team published a paper on July 22, announcing the successful synthesis of LK-99, an atmospheric-pressure room-temperature superconductor for the first time, and global scientific research teams are following up and analyzing it</EN>

<CN>美国宣布向台湾提供价值3.45亿美元的军事援助，包括为台湾提供装备、军事教育和培训</CN><EN>The US announced $345 million worth of military aid to Taiwan, including equipment, military education and training for Taiwan</EN>

<CN>28日9时55分，台风“杜苏芮”在福建晋江沿海登陆，最高阵风在17级以上，登陆时中心附近最大风力15级</CN><EN>At 9:55 on the 28th, typhoon 'Du Surui' landed on the coast of Jinjiang, Fujian, with the highest gust above level 17, and the maximum wind force near the center was level 15 when it landed</EN>
